{{also|hand|HAND|h√§nd|h√•nd|hand.|h√•nd-}} ==English== ===Etymology=== {{rfelite|en}} ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # {{surname|en}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|en|Hand County}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=adhn|Dahn|Danh|NADH|dahn|hDNA}} ---- ==Central Franconian== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|gmw-cfr|Hank}} {{qualifier|chiefly western Ripuarian}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|gmw-cfr|goh||*hand}}, northern variant of {{m|goh|hant}}. The regular form in Moselle Franconian and some southern dialects of Ripuarian is ''Hand'' with a plural {{m|gmw-cfr|H√§nn}} (< ''*hende'') through the development: intervocalic ''-nd-'' ‚Üí ''-nn-''. The regular form in most of Ripuarian is ''Hank'' with a plural {{m|gmw-cfr|H√§ng}} (< ''*henge'') through [[velarization]] and subsequently a corresponding development: intervocalic ''-≈ãg-'' ‚Üí ''-≈ã≈ã-''. These regular systems are preserved in Moselle Franconian and western Ripuarian. In many eastern and central Ripuarian dialects, the native velarization has to a large degree been reverted under the influence of standard German and surrounding varieties. This reversion, which has emanated from Cologne, is irregular, affecting ''-nk'' more than it does ''-ng-'', and hence it has led to occasional variation between velarized and de-velarized forms within the inflectional paradigm of one word (compare {{m|gmw-cfr|Wand}}, {{m|gmw-cfr|Zand}}, {{m|gmw-cfr|sch√§nge}}). ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|gmw-cfr|/hant/}} ===Noun=== {{head|gmw-cfr|noun|g=f|plural|H√§nn|or|H√§ng|diminutive|H√§ndche}} # {{topics|gmw-cfr|Body parts}} {{lb|gmw-cfr|many dialects}} [[hand]] ====Usage notes==== * The plural ''H√§nn'' is used in Moselle Franconian and some southern dialects of Ripuarian. The form ''H√§ng'' is used in many Ripuarian dialects, including [[K√∂lsch]]. ---- ==German== {{picdic |image=Paume de main.jpeg |width=310 |labels= {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=18|posx=100|posy=179|link=Handfl√§che}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=10|posy=200|link=Handgelenk|align=left}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=90|posy=70|link=Daumen}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=200|posy=125|link=Zeigefinger}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=225|posy=160|link=Mittelfinger}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=220|posy=205|link=Ringfinger}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=200|posy=245|link=kleiner Finger}} |detail1=Click on labels in the image |detail2= {{picdicimg|de|image=Arm flex supinate.jpg|link=Arm}} }} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|}}, from {{inh|de|goh|hant}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*handuz}}.
